summary.Title: Python Developer
summary.Presentation: Transforming e-commerce space as Scandinavia’s leading online retailer of premium designer lighting is no small task. We are looking for people with the right mix of passion and technical knowledge

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Transforming e-commerce space as Scandinavia’s leading online retailer of premium designer lighting is no small task. We are looking for people with the right mix of passion and technical knowledge to get the job done. Our goal is to build relationships based on trust, resulting in happy, passionate, loyal customers and colleagues.

In general, your typical work day as a Python Developer involves:

  • Building internal apps to facilitate the growth of our brand
  • Creating and developing new functionalities focusing on process automation
  • Assisting in management of our servers and databases

Being a Python Developer requires:

  • Upholding to high engineering standards and bring consistency
  • Excellent knowledge of Python;
  • Passion for writing clean and scalable code;
  • An intense intellectual curiosity and an eagerness to share knowledge with others;


An ideal candidate:

  • Has experience working with Python frameworks like Django, Flask or similar;
  • Has some SQL or JavaScript experience;
  • Is interested in digging deeper into data or growing into a fullstack role.
  • Must be fluent and eloquent in English.

Sounds like you?
Our team will be excited to review your application! Please send your CV and Cover Letter via email mads@andlight.dk with the subject “Python Developer Application”. Interviews will be held on an ongoing basis and will conclude when the right candidate is found.

Note: Only complete applications received at mads@andlight.dk will be reviewed.

About AndLight

AndLight is Scandinavia’s leading online retailer of premium designer lighting with the ambition of becoming Europe’s largest in 2025 by following a sustainable growth strategy with the help of a dynamic team. We are currently expanding our office in Copenhagen and looking for curious colleagues who are passionate about crunching numbers, transferring data and building automated workflows We offer fast-paced positions with a steep learning curves and exciting challenges in a young and international team of students, serial entrepreneurs, and digital marketers.

Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion at AndLight

We’re a global team improving diversity, equity, and inclusion in the ecommerce industry. At AndLight, we want people to love their work and show respect and empathy to all. We welcome differences and strive to increase participation from traditionally underrepresented groups. Diversity, Equity and Inclusion is a priority at AndLight, though our dedication influences far more than just our team members.
